title: Open-Air, Green-Solvent Processed Organic Solar Cells with Efficiency Approaching 18% and Exceptional Stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01944J, Paper
Changduk Yang, Thi Le Huyen Mai, Zhe Sun, Seoyoung Kim, Seonghun Jeong, Seunglok Lee, Jeewon Park
Major challenges associated with bringing organic solar cells (OSCs) to industrial market are to further improve power conversion efficiency (PCE), device stability, and green-solvent processability within open-air (OA) environment. High-performance...
